text: “Ndipo kumbukirani pamene Iye adakupangani inu kuti mukhale alowa m’malo a Ad, ndipo adakupatsani malo okhala m’dziko lino. Inu mwamanga nyumba zolemekezeka m’chidikha chake ndiponso mwaboola nyumba pakati pa mapiri ake. Motero kumbukirani zokoma za Mulungu ndipo musachulukitse kuwononga padziko lapansi.”
